articles.title: Ask Amy: My friend included her snoring husband in our planned trip to see Broadway musicals - OregonLive
articles.description: He tends to fall asleep during performances and audibly snores!
articles.content:
Dear Amy: My friend Annie and I are both in our mid-20s and love musicals. We decided to travel to New York in October to see a few shows.
The tickets were fairly pricey, so I was planning on saving… [+4225 chars]

articles.author: Sean Adams | sadams@pennlive.com
articles.title: Jason Aldean plays the hits (yes, including that one) and addresses controversy at Hershey concert - PennLive
articles.description: The "Try That In A Small Town" singer said he didn't like to talk much during his shows, but did speak briefly about the song that has become a lightning rod for many critics.
